text: Diavlo is a steel roller coaster at Himeji Central Park in Japan which is a clone of Batman the Ride. It is one of the first Bolliger & Mabillard roller coasters to be located outside of the United States, and the second by launch date; opening four months later than Nemesis at Alton Towers, England. Category:Roller coasters in Japan Category:Roller coasters introduced in 1994 Category:Inverted roller coasters manufactured by Bolliger & Mabillard
title: Diavlo (roller coaster)
